Instruction: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
In a separate bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form. Gently fold the beaten egg whites into the batter until just combined.
Pour the batter into a non-stick Bundtï¿½ fluted tube pan.

Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, approximately 60 minutes. Allow to cool in the pans for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. Carefully loosen the edges with a knife and transfer the cake onto a serving platter.
